Producer: Zach Braff, Pamela Koffler, Christina Piovesan, Florence Pugh, Noah Segal, Christine Vachon
Production Co: Elevation Pictures, Killer Films, Elevation Films, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM)
Synopsis: Daniel (Morgan Freeman) is brought together with Allison (Florence Pugh), the once thriving young woman with a bright future who was involved in an unimaginable tragedy that took his daughter's life. As grief-stricken Daniel navigates raising his teenage granddaughter and Allison seeks redemption, they discover that friendship, forgiveness, and hope can flourish in unlikely places.
Title: A Good Person
